title: Clubhouse, Flexible Lease Terms Available, Amazon Package Lockers
posting_body: ['$600.00 Up to first month Free', 'The Avondale', '9225 West Charleston Blvd, Las Vegas, NV, 89117', 'Interested in more information?', 'See link below:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 29', 'OR Text', '29', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our leasing team.', 'The Avondale Apartments in Las Vegas, NV', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 854 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Our community offers newly remodeled apartment homes with features like full-size washers and dryers, upgraded blinds and valances, solid oak cabinetry, stainless steel appliances, and walk-in closets.', "From the kitchen to the bathroom, we've added details that make living at The Avondale a luxury experience.", 'The Avondale Apartments are a pet-friendly community has a three resort-style swimming pools, a large fitness center, barbecue areas throughout the property and easy access to 3+ miles of jogging trails.', 'We are conveniently located within Peccole Ranch and are near Summerlin Parkway, I-95 and the 215 Beltway for an easy commute.', 'Features', '- Washer & Dryer in Unit', '- Cable and Wi-Fi ready', '- Stainless Steel Appliances', '- Fire places in every apartment', '- Walk-In closets', 'Community Amenities', '- (3) Resort Style Swimming Pools', '- Gated Access', '- 24hr Emergency Maintenance', '- Bark Park & Dog Wash Station', '- Yoga & TRX Studio', '- Clubhouse', '- BBQ Areas', '- Beautiful Landscaping', '- Flexible Lease Terms Available', '- Online Maintenance Requests', '- Amazon Package Lockers', '- Professional Management', '- Recreation Area', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday: 9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday-Sunday: 10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Pet Policy', 'No weight restrictions', 'Breed restrictions do apply', 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.', 'mUsooG34O']
